item.description:
New Year's Day Potluck to Celebrate Randy Jacob's Birthday - Sat. Jan. 1
Come celebrate Randy Jacob's Birthday at a New Year's Day Potluck


When - Saturday, January 1 from 2 - 5 pm

Where - home of Betsy Bragg, 126 Myrtle St., Waltham, MA 02453 for directions see 2nd location on website www.optimumhealthsolution.org


What to bring: a raw vegan, unprocessed dish for 8 with utensils and recipe.


Reservations required: space limited to 20. Call Betsy at 617-835-2913 or email Betsy@OptimumHealthSolution.org with your name, email, phone number and what you are bringing. Be sure Betsy confirms with you.

__________________________________________________________
We would like to invite you to attend this pot luck to share food and friendship and to have some fun. We'll have a great time sharing ideas, trying new foods and spreading the word about healthful living! Decide to feel great, get energy, share your health tips and experiences and a great raw and living foods meal with friends!

Raw Potluck: All attending are requested to bring a 100% raw, organic, unprocessed, non-animal based (vegan with no honey) ready-to-serve dish for 6 - 8 people. You do not have to be a gourmet chef to attend; just bring a dish that you like. Please bring a typed or neatly printed recipe to display next to your dish ideally with copies for people to take with them if they so choose.

This document explains what is and isn't raw vegan:
files.meetup.com/587600/Raw_Vegan_Food_List_v6.doc

Ideas for Raw Vegan Dish (without honey):
1. organic green salad,
2. raw recipe from online,
www.rawnewenglandcommunity.com/phpbb2/
www.living-foods.com/recipes
goneraw.com/recipes
www.rawsacramento.net/recipes.htm
www.rawfoodlife.com/Raw_Resources/Raw_Food_Recipes/raw_food_recipes.html www.shazzie.com/raw/recipes
www.rawganique.com/recipes.htm
3. raw recipe from a raw food book, or
4. organic fruit salad.

Best Regards,
Daryl
item.name: OHS Potluck & Birthday Party for Randy Jacobs
